mapper.insert: insert into inquire (inquire_no, inquire_id, inquire_title, inquire_content) values (#{inquireNo}, #{inquireId}, #{inquireTitle}, #{inquireContent})
mapper.select: select * from (select tmp.*, rownum rn from (select * from inquire order by inquire_no desc)TMP) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select tmp.*, rownum rn from (select * from inquire where inquire_id =#{inquireId} and instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by inquire_no desc)tmp) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) from inquire where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 and inquire_id =#{inquireId}
mapper.update: update inquire set inquire_title = #{inquireTitle}, inquire_content = #{inquireContent}, inquire_updatedate = sysdate where inquire_no = #{inquireNo}
